I know how to use it, I just select a part in the middile of the ship, and Then you select the part you want as the root, such as a docking port or whatever. - Oh and I ve got some eye candy for you.

http://i1275.photobucket.com/albums/y454/ethan_lewis1/screenshot1_zpse8358c67.png

http://i1275.photobucket.com/albums/y454/ethan_lewis1/screenshot2_zpsac82efd9.png

http://i1275.photobucket.com/albums/y454/ethan_lewis1/screenshot3_zps1620c45a.png

That looks amazing......... It's beautiful.

That looks amazing......... It's beautiful.

I introduce, unto you, the Celereon Class Command Cruiser!

It has 2 anti ship torpedoes as 2 poppet turrets. It has 6 different antennas and multiple drone control modules, It also boasts decent speed with a double afterburner system and 4 NERVA's for efficient propulsion, It has space for a very large crew - 14 max

It has a C.P.A.C (Conductive Plating Advanced Communications) Unit on the back (the big stretched out dish)

"The double Hull design allows for a much more focused electronic footprint, the CPAC actually electrifies the hull of the and uses this to boost EWAR capabil - Yadda Yadda"

One of the Lab Boy's.

I introduce, unto you, the Celereon Class Command Cruiser!

"The double Hull design allows for a much more focused electronic footprint, the CPAC actually electrifies the hull of the and uses this to boost EWAR capabil - Yadda Yadda"
